ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL(Pre_Deal_Status__c, "NEW LEAD") || ISPICKVAL(Pre_Deal_Status__c, "ATTEMPTING") || ISPICKVAL(Pre_Deal_Status__c, "APPOINTMENT SET") || ISPICKVAL(Pre_Deal_Status__c, "FOLLOW UP") || ISPICKVAL(Pre_Deal_Status__c, "Reduced pays with Creditor") || ISPICKVAL(Pre_Deal_Status__c, "FUTURE FOLLOW UP"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Qualified") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot move this lead to 'Qualified' while it is in its current Pre-Deal Status.
